moves.name: Nature's Wrath
moves.flavor_text: The observation invokes nature’s wrath. Raises all stats by 20%.

moves.name: Autotomy
moves.flavor_text: The observation sacrifices a limb. Lose 25% of max HP, and double evasion.

moves.name: Spine Shield
moves.flavor_text: The observation puts up a shield of spines. Reduce odds of taking damage by 50% and deal 25% of opponent’s max HP in damage if the opponent makes contact.

moves.name: Foul Odor
moves.flavor_text: The observation releases a foul odor. Reduce the opponent’s accuracy and attack power by 20%.

moves.name: Run Away
moves.flavor_text: The observation attempts to flee. Reduce odds of taking damage by 50% and raise speed by 20%.

moves.name: Fly Off
moves.flavor_text: The observation flies away. Reduce odds of taking damage by 60%.

moves.name: Play Dead
moves.flavor_text: The observation plays dead and hopes the opponent loses interest. Lose 25% of max HP to avoid additional damage and raise speed by 20%.

moves.name: Bristle Coat
moves.flavor_text: The observation puffs out its bristle coat. Reduce incoming damage by 50% and lower opponent’s attack by 30%.

moves.name: Warning Colors
moves.flavor_text: The observation flashes warning colors at the opponent. Reduce opponent’s attack and defense by 20%.

moves.name: Irritant Compound
moves.flavor_text: The observation releases an irritating compound that wears down the opponent. Opponent loses 12.5% of their max HP per turn.

moves.name: Mimesis
moves.flavor_text: The observation blends in with its surrounding then strikes.

moves.name: Chemical Spray
moves.flavor_text: The observation sprays the opponent with harmful chemicals.

moves.name: Explosive Reaction
moves.flavor_text: The observation uses chemicals inside its body to create a small explosion. This also damages the user.

moves.name: Sticky Compound
moves.flavor_text: The observation releases a sticky compound to slow the opponent, then strikes.

moves.name: Urticating Hairs
moves.flavor_text: Sharp hairs on the observation’s body puncture the opponent and release a harmful compound.

moves.name: Stinging Venom
moves.flavor_text: The observation injects the opponent with strong venom, dealing damage.

moves.name: Hiss
moves.flavor_text: The observation lets out a sharp hiss, reducing all the opponent’s stats by 10%.

moves.name: Embiggen
moves.flavor_text: The observation puffs out its body, lowering the opponent’s attack and defense by 20%.

moves.name: Sacrificial Tail
moves.flavor_text: The observation sacrifices its own tail to avoid additional damage and retreat. Observation loses 25% of max HP.

moves.name: Tail Whap
moves.flavor_text: The observation swings its heavy tail at the opponent.

moves.name: Spines
moves.flavor_text: The observation punctures the opponent with its spines.

moves.name: Element of Surprise
moves.flavor_text: The observation lowers the opponent’s guard, then strikes.

moves.name: Rapid Lunge
moves.flavor_text: The observation lunges at the opponent, raising its speed in the process.

moves.name: Cold Blooded
moves.flavor_text: The observation attacks its opponent without mercy.

moves.name: Daily Migration
moves.flavor_text: The observation moves locations to avoid detection. Doubles evasion.

moves.name: Cognitive Mapping
moves.flavor_text: The observation studies its surroundings, raising its evasion and accuracy by 60%.

moves.name: Benthic Camouflage
moves.flavor_text: The observation camouflages itself in the benthos, raising its attack, defense, and speed by 20%.

moves.name: Shoal Up
moves.flavor_text: The observation forms a shoal and attacks, doubling HP in the process.

moves.name: Territory Defense
moves.flavor_text: The observation fights furiously to defend its territory.

moves.name: Wrassling
moves.flavor_text: The observation calls its Wrass buddies to ward off the opponent.

moves.name: Loud Roar
moves.flavor_text: The observation terrifies the opponent with a loud roar. Reduces the opponent’s attack and defense by 30%.

moves.name: Night Vision
moves.flavor_text: The observation uses its night vision to ensure the next move will hit.

moves.name: Passive Aggression
moves.flavor_text: The observation makes the opponent lose the will to fight. The opponent switches with a party member in waiting.

moves.name: Prehensile Tail
moves.flavor_text: The observation uses its prehensile tail to improve mobility. Doubles evasion.

moves.name: Multiply
moves.flavor_text: The observation’s family comes to its defense.

moves.name: Nail Scratch
moves.flavor_text: The observation scratches the opponent with sharp nails.

moves.name: Sharp Teeth
moves.flavor_text: The observation bites the opponent with sharp teeth.

moves.name: Develop Tools
moves.flavor_text: The observation develops a tool that will guarantee a knock out.

moves.name: Strong Kick
moves.flavor_text: The observation uses its strong legs to deliver a powerful kick.

moves.name: Secrete Mucous
moves.flavor_text: The observation secretes a healing mucous that heals 25% of max HP every turn.

moves.name: Poison Skin
moves.flavor_text: The observation makes contact with the opponent, poisoning them.

moves.name: Regenerate
moves.flavor_text: The observation regenerates a lost limb and fully heals. Only usable after Autotomy.

moves.name: Neurotoxin
moves.flavor_text: The observation sacrifices itself to deal massive damage.

moves.name: Writhe
moves.flavor_text: The observation writhes about, damaging the opponent.

moves.name: Tail Lash
moves.flavor_text: The observation lashes out with its tail.

moves.name: Venom Glands
moves.flavor_text: The observation injects its opponent with a powerful venom.

moves.name: Sclerotised Pharynx
moves.flavor_text: The observation sucks its opponent into its mouth.

moves.name: Stinger
moves.flavor_text: The observation lashes out with a sharp stinger.

moves.name: Leap On
moves.flavor_text: The observation leaps onto the opponent and starts attacking.

moves.name: Hide and Strike
moves.flavor_text: The observation camouflages itself, then leaps out at its opponent. This move always goes first.

moves.name: Spidey Sense
moves.flavor_text: The observation avoids the opponent’s attack and counterattacks. Fails if the user does not move first.

moves.name: Den Trap
moves.flavor_text: The observation lays a trap for the opponent, dealing massive damage if they make contact. Fails if the user does not move first.

moves.name: Tail Feathers
moves.flavor_text: The observation uses its tail feathers as a rudder, raising its accuracy by 60%.

moves.name: Flight Feathers
moves.flavor_text: The observation uses its fight feathers to increase its speed by 60%.

moves.name: Sustained Flight
moves.flavor_text: The observation prepares for a long flight, resting occasionally to restore HP.

moves.name: Talon Grab
moves.flavor_text: The observation grabs the opponent in its talons, preventing it from attacking next turn.

moves.name: Drop
moves.flavor_text: Can only be used after Talon Grab. Drops the opponent from high up for massive damage.

moves.name: Puncture
moves.flavor_text: The observation breaks through the opponents defenses with its strong beak. Reduces opponent's defense by 50%.

moves.name: Swoop In
moves.flavor_text: The observation closes the distance between it and its opponent, then strikes. This move always hits.

moves.name: Hard Shell
moves.flavor_text: The observation uses its hard shell to max out its defense.

moves.name: Seafood Surprise
moves.flavor_text: The observation surprises the opponent by using a random move.

moves.name: Jet Propulsion
moves.flavor_text: The observation uses its jet propulsion to ram the opponent. This move always goes first.

moves.name: Extra Membrane
moves.flavor_text: The observation uses its extra membrane to avoid taking damage for 2 turns. Only usable on the first turn.

moves.name: Chlorophyll c
moves.flavor_text: The observation absorbs light and fully heals itself.

moves.name: Cilia
moves.flavor_text: The observation teaches its team about movement, increasing speed by 20%.

moves.name: Avoid Detection
moves.flavor_text: The observation hides in plain sight. Reduce incoming damage by 50% for 2 turns.

moves.name: Dazzle
moves.flavor_text: The observation dazzles the opponent, lowering its attack and defense by 30%.

moves.name: Nature's Beauty
moves.flavor_text: The observation sacrifices itself to provide nutrition for its team. Increase team’s attack and defense by 20%.

moves.name: Cell Wall
moves.flavor_text: The observation’s sturdy cell wall increases its defense by 40%.

moves.name: Deep Roots
moves.flavor_text: The observation spreads its roots, draining the opponent’s energy. Makes the user unable to retreat.

moves.name: Tap Root
moves.flavor_text: The observation extends its tap root deep into the earth, drawing up nutrients and healing up to 50% of its max HP.

moves.name: Edible Arrangement
moves.flavor_text: The observation makes a decorative basket of itself, fully healing all team members.

moves.name: Thorns
moves.flavor_text: The observation’s thorns deal massive damage if the opponent makes contact.

moves.name: Symbiotic Relationship
moves.flavor_text: The observation plays host to other observations which defend it from attacks.

moves.name: Toxic Spores
moves.flavor_text: The observation releases spores that prevent the use of the opponent’s next move.

moves.name: Pathogenic Fungus
moves.flavor_text: The observation takes control of insects, destroying them from the inside.

moves.name: Polyketides
moves.flavor_text: The observation produces metabolites that destroy other Fungi.

moves.name: Host Control
moves.flavor_text: The observation uses one of the opponent’s attacks against it.

moves.name: Rapid Spread
moves.flavor_text: The observation spreads to cover a large area becoming harder to knock out.

moves.name: Yeast
moves.flavor_text: The observation switches with a party member in waiting and prevents the opponent from attacking next turn.

moves.name: Adaptation
moves.flavor_text: The observation uses a strong attack that will always hit when used consecutively.
